ingredients: 1 large winter squash (about 2 1/2 pounds), such as butternut or kabocha, peeled, seeded, and cut into 2-inch pieces
2 apples, such as Granny Smith, peeled, cored, and quartered
4 cups Vegetable broth Andy's Vegetable Stock
Cilantro Walnut Pesto Cilantro Walnut Pesto, for garnish (optional)
